meanings.definition: Regarded with great respect or reverence.
meanings.sent1: The venerated elder shared wisdom with the community.
meanings.sent2: The venerated statue stood tall in the town square.
meanings.sent3: The venerated cat demanded royal treatment from its owners.
meanings.sent4: Her venerated presence in the room silenced all chatter.
meanings.sent5: The venerated oak tree's branches reached for the sky in a majestic display.

meanings.sent1: The venerated tradition was passed down through generations.
meanings.sent2: The venerated author received accolades for her latest book.
meanings.sent3: The venerated cupcake won first place in the bake-off.
meanings.sent4: His venerated skills on the basketball court earned him a scholarship.
meanings.sent5: The venerated mountain peak offered a breathtaking view of the valley below.
